title: Divine Hunter - Novel Updates
author: Not A Floating Cloud
description:
The era of full-dive virtual reality network has arrived all of a sudden. As the world rejoices in excitement, Chen Mo, a hacker receives a job. He was told to enter a game, finds a game-breaking bug to stop the full-dive virtual reality network from taking over. 

 

In order to complete the job, Chen Mo entered the VR MMORPG - Genesis.>
